author: pdodds
msg: Added the functionality to bundle the require libs into the service unit,  however this also required a change to the servicemix components to make servicemix core a provided library and also the loan-broker-lw-su/pom.xml to add servicemix-core as a provided library to stop the whole of the servicemix being packaged under the SU.
